messages.subject: Re: Girl Scouts/Lesbians
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/14/2001 12:01:46 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Girl Scouts is not associated in any way with the Boy Scouts, and has entirely different
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/14/2001 12:01:46 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> BTW, didn't you mention in a much earlier post that Beth was involved with
> the Girl Scouts? How does THAT work?
>
>

Girl Scouts is not associated in any way with the Boy Scouts, and has
entirely different policies. Girl Scouts do not discriminate against lesbians
and gays, and Beth, who directs a regional GS council office, is out at
work. Beth actually wrote a chapter in a book about Lesbians in Girl
Scouting (On My Honor: Lesbians Reflect on their Scouting Experience).

Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
